name: Mine Field (PineGames)
description:
Long time ago.. before Minesweeper, before Windows 3.11.. there was a little text game "Mine Field".  A game that couldn't be played without imagination, but was running on any hardware.

I tried to add as little as possible to it.

You start in the lower left corner and try to end up in upper right corner. As you stand on a field - it shows you how many mines are on the fields right next to it. If you step on a mine - you die. If you get to the upper right corner - you win!

Controls: WASD or arrow keys while "in the field" . Mouse to choose difficulty.
